description: This file implements ASN.1 object types, specifically 'OtherName' and 'OtherString', including their creation, attributes, child objects, and related methods for encoding and decoding ASN.1 structures used in cryptographic and certificate contexts.

classes.name: ANSC_ASN1_OTHERNAME
classes.description: Represents the ASN.1 OBJECT 'OtherName', modeled as a sequence with an OID and an 'OtherString' component.

classes.name: ANSC_ASN1_OTHERSTRING
classes.description: Represents the ASN.1 CHOICE 'OtherString', which currently supports the 'kerberos' name type.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscAsn1CreateOtherName(ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes an 'OtherName' ASN.1 object, setting up its children and attributes.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscAsn1OtherNameCreateChildObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG index)
methods.description: Creates child ASN.1 objects for 'OtherName' based on the index (OID or OtherString).

methods.name: PANSC_ATTR_OBJECT AnscAsn1OtherNameCreateChildAttr(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG index)
methods.description: Creates attribute objects for the child components of 'OtherName'.

methods.name: PCHAR AnscAsn1OtherNameGetChildName(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG index)
methods.description: Returns the name string of the child component based on index ('id' or 'other').

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscAsn1CreateOtherString(ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes an 'OtherString' ASN.1 choice object, setting up possible selection options.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscAsn1OtherStringCreateSelection(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG index)
methods.description: Creates a specific choice (e.g., KerberosName) within the 'OtherString' ASN.1 choice.

methods.name: PCHAR AnscAsn1OtherStringGetSelectionName(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG selType)
methods.description: Returns the selection name for a given choice index ('kerberos').

methods.name: PANSC_ATTR_OBJECT AnscAsn1OtherStringCreateSelectionAttr(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG selType)
methods.description: Creates attributes for the choices within 'OtherString'.

methods.name: BOOLEAN AnscAsn1OtherStringGetChoiceTagValue(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG uIndex,PASN_OBJECT_FORM_TYPE pAttr,PULONG pTagValue)
methods.description: Retrieves the ASN.1 tag value for a selected choice; currently stubbed to return FALSE.
